link.title: Walker County School System – Ensuring all students graduate ready for college, work, and life.
Walker County School System » Comments Feed

div.div: At this time there is no scheduled date for Kindergarten Registration. We will post and update as soon as more information is available.

div.p:
It is our pleasure to welcome you to Walker County Schools. We are glad you chose to stop by and see the many amazing things happening with our students and throughout our communities. Our website has been redesigned to provide quick and easy access for our parents and community as well as those considering our school system as part of their future. Our goal is to provide timely and necessary information allowing you to stay connected with your child in their educational journey. We value your input and look forward to working together to assure the success of every student placed in our care.
read more

Ensuring all students graduate:
Ready for College
Ready for Work
Ready for Life
